column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " I guess I just panicked .
#Text=You had a perfect stance , and a perfect form .
#Text=But when it came right down to it , you did n't have the guts !
#Text=" Aang says : " I know .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , you are sorry !
#Text=If you 're not tough enough to stop the rock , then you can at least give it the pleasure of smashing you instead of jumping out of the way like a jelly - boned wimp !
#Text=Now , do you have what it takes to face that rock like an earthbender ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I do n't think I do .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , it 's no big deal .
#Text=You 'll take a break and try earthbending again when you 're ready .
#Text=Besides , you still have a lot of waterbending to work on .
#Text=Okay ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , that sounds good .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , whatever , go splash around until you feel better .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why ca n't I do it ?
#Text=Instead of lightning it keeps exploding in my face ... like everything always does .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I was afraid this might happen .
#Text=You will not be able to master lightning until you have dealt with the turmoil inside you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What turmoil ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko , you must let go of your feelings of shame if you want your anger to go away .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But I do n't feel any shame at all .
#Text=I 'm as proud as ever .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , pride is not the opposite of shame , but its source .
#Text=True humility is the only antidote to shame .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , my life has been nothing but humbling lately .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I have another idea .
#Text=I will teach you a firebending move that even Azula does n't know , because I made it up myself .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You probably think I deserve this , do n't you ?
#Text=Look , I 'm sorry I hunted you , but that 's just the natural order of things .
#Text=Big things eat smaller things , nothing personal .
#Text=But this time it did n't work out that way .
#Text=I admit it ... you 're cute .
#Text=Okay , you convinced me , if I get out of this alive , it 's a karmically correct , vegetarian existence for me .
#Text=No meat .
#Text=Even though meat is so tasty .
#Text=Hey , looks like my karma is already paying off !
#Text=That 's okay , I got it .
#Text=Now , come back boomerang .
#Text=" Katara says : " You know this block you 're having is only temporary , right ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't want to talk about it .
#Text=" Katara says : " You do realize that 's the problem , do n't you ?
#Text=If you face this issue instead of avoiding it – " Aang says : " I know , I know , I know , I know !
#Text=I get it , all right ?
#Text=I need to face it head on like a rock , but I just ca n't do it .
#Text=I do n't know why I ca n't , but I ca n't .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , if fire and water are opposites , then what 's the opposite of air ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess it 's earth .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's why it 's so difficult for you to get this .
#Text=You 're working with your natural opposite .
#Text=But you 'll figure it out .
#Text=I know you will .
#Text=Think fast !
#Text=Excellent .
#Text=You have the reflexes of a waterbending master .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks , Katara .
#Text=Sifu Katara .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Fire is the element of power .
#Text=The people of the Fire Nation have desire and will , and the energy to drive and achieve what they want .
#Text=Earth is the element of substance .
#Text=The people of the Earth Kingdom are diverse and strong .
#Text=They are persistent and enduring .
#Text=Air is the element of freedom .
#Text=The Air Nomads detached themselves from worldly concerns and found peace and freedom .
#Text=Also , they apparently had pretty good senses of humor !
#Text=Water is the element of change .
#Text=The people of the Water Tribe are capable of adapting to many things .
#Text=They have a deep sense of community and love that holds them together through anything .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why are you telling me these things ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " It is important to draw wisdom from many different places .
#Text=If you take it from only one place , it becomes rigid and stale .
#Text=Understanding others , the other elements , and the other nations will help you become whole .
#Text=" Zuko says : " All this four elements talk is sounding like Avatar stuff .
#Text=" Iroh says : " It is the combination of the four elements in one person that makes the Avatar so powerful .
#Text=But it can make you more powerful , too .
#Text=You see the technique I 'm about to teach you is one I learned by studying the waterbenders .
#Text=" Toph says : " Aang , I found these nuts in your bag .
#Text=I figured you would n't mind .
#Text=And besides , even if you did , you 're too much of a pushover to do anything about it .
#Text=" Aang says : " As a matter of fact , I do n't mind .
#Text=I 'm happy to share anything I have .
#Text=" Toph says : " You know , I 'm really glad you feel that way .
#Text=Because I also have this great new nutcracker .
#Text=" Aang says : " Actually , I prefer if you did n't ... That 's an antique , handcrafted by the monks ... It 's a delicate instrument !
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's not the only delicate instrument around here .
#Text=" Aang says : " Ohm .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey Aang , have you seen – " Aang says : " Meditating here !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's important .
#Text=It 's almost sundown and Sokka is n't back yet .
#Text=I think we should search for him .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 'll find him faster if we split up .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay , karma person or thing , whoever 's in charge of this stuff .
#Text=If I can just get out of this situation alive , I will give up meat and sarcasm .
#Text=Okay ?
#Text=Ow !
#Text=That 's all I got .
#Text=It 's pretty much my whole identity .
#Text=Sokka , the meat and sarcasm guy .
#Text=But I 'm willing to be Sokka , the veggies and straight talk fellow .
#Text=Deal ?
#Text=Aang !
#Text=Thank goodness !
#Text=Have you got any meat ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka !
#Text=Are you okay ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aggh , stop , stop !
#Text=You 're going to pull my fingers off and I do n't think the rest of me is coming !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hmmm ... I bet I can airbend you out of here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Seriously Aang , I know you 're new at it , but I could use a little earthbending here .
#Text=How about it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't ... I ca n't do it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , if you ca n't earthbend me out of here , go get Toph .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't do that either .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You ca n't ?
#Text=Why not ?
#Text=" Aang says : " It would just be really ... uncomfortable .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Uncomfortable ?
#Text=Well , I would n't want you to feel uncomfortable ... " Aang says : " Thanks , Sokka .
#Text=This whole earthbending thing really has me confused .
#Text=There 's so much pressure .
#Text=Everyone expects me to get it right away .
#Text=It puts me in a really awkward position .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Awkward position , I think I know the feeling .
#Text=" Aang says : " If I try , I fail .
#Text=If I do n't try , I 'm never going to get it .
#Text=I feel like I 'm caught between a rock and a hard place .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hmmm ... how about that .
#Text=Aang , this is my friend , Foo Foo Cuddlypoops .
#Text=Foo Foo Cuddlypoops , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Awww , what a cute name for a baby saber - tooth moose - lion cub .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Really ?
#Text=He looks nothing like a saber - tooth moose - lion .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's hard to tell before their giant teeth and horns grow in .
#Text=What are you doing out here little guy ?
#Text=Did you lose your mama ?
#Text="
